overview:
Edward “Toby” Lenk is the president of Gap, Inc. Direct, which handles all online sales and retail for the Gap consortium. He previously founded Gamefly in 2002,and has served on the Board of Directors since the company’s formation.

Mr. Lenk has served as the President of Gap, Inc. Direct since April 2003. Mr. Lenk was a founder of GameFly and served as our founding Chief Executive Officer from our formation in 2002 to April 2003. Mr. Lenk holds a Master of Business Administration degree from the Harvard Business School and a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics and Government from Bowdoin College.
